Title: Increases to $10,000 the contribution that a resident taxpayer may make to family tuition accounts for each child during a taxable year
Summary: Increases the contribution that a resident taxpayer may make to family tuition accounts for each beneficiary thereof during a taxable year.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to increasing the authorized resident taxpayer contribution to family tuition accounts to $10,000 per taxable year for each beneficiary thereof
